details.title: Better UI
items: Updated Skin previews in trap selector to always use the currently equipped base

details.title: Better Journal
items: Added 'Show Full Mice Images in Journal' option (was a beta feature)

details.title: Better Maps
items: Updated styles

details.title: Better Mice
items: Added ability to hit 'Cmd/Ctrl + C' on King's Crowns pages to copy data in the Crown Tracker Spreadsheet expected format

details.title: Better Travel
items: Added ability to toggle sorting by name in the Travel Window

details.title: Data Exporters
items: Added 'Mouse Stats by Crowns' exporter to export your mouse stats to the Crown Tracker Spreadsheet

details.title: Experiments / Beta Features
items: Added 'Memory Matching Game' experiment. You can enable it and find it in the 'Camp' menu dropdown.
Removed 'Better Journal List: Link all items' experiment, as it is now added to Better Journal
Removed 'Full Mice Images in Journal' experiment, as it is now an option in Better Journal
Removed 'Prestige Base in skin previews' experiment, as it is now added to Better UI with support for all bases

details.title: Favorite Setups
items: Added ability to drag and drop setups to reorder them
Updated setup name generation to automatically create a name based on the selected setup
Updated highlighted setups that match the current location to be limited to 3
Updated placement in sidebar to consistently show in the same place
Updated styles

details.title: Fixes
items: Fixed default MouseHunt behavior that shows a portion of the Minotaur's horn when in any district in Zokor

details.title: Location Dashboard
items: Added Draconic Depths to the location dashboard
Fixed images in Floating Islands dashboard sometimes showing the wrong type
Fixed Seasonal Garden showing 0% Amp when going to Zugzwang Tower, rather than hiding it
Fixed data being incorrect for your current location

details.title: Location HUD: Zokor
items: Added Memory Matching minigame to Zokor HUD
Updated HUD to show current stealth instead of 'Leader Beaten' after catching the boss
Updated styles

details.title: Location HUD: Seasonal Garden
items: Fixed tooltip display issues
Updated styles

details.title: Location HUD: Zugzwang Tower
items: Updated styles

details.title: Location HUD: Folklore Forest Region
items: Fixed double-crafting issue for certain ME items when using the quick-craft button

details.title: Ultimate Checkmark
items: Updated required items to include the new Draconic Depths items

details.title: Other
items: Improved data caching and expiration handling
Fixed issue where data was cached indefinitely
Minor performance improvements
